name: Cybershot 3000
description:
Cybershot 3000 is a doom like fps shooter, where you have to survive and get to the end to win. You can find the backstory here:

All credits are mentioned in the game!

Warning: Mouse Sensitivity is bugged in Unity WebGl Games! This is not our fault, as it is a Unity issue. If you would like a better experience, download the game!
